page.title: 02THE JOYS OF RURAL LIFE.
page.content: Most of the villagers whom we interviewed told us that they had retired to Brook because it was peaceful.Although it seems that there is little to do the elderly people enjoy the{beautiful country {walks}that are available to them,however transport is essential as the nearest town is four miles away.Fortunately there are{three bus {routes}travelling through Brook that can take the locals to{Freshwater,} {Newport}and {Ventnor.} The village, unspoiled by modern day pollutions,provides{picturesque {scenery}for the few tourists that visit Brook and also for the locals who inhabit this area.
